text: Flossenbürg (Northern Bavarian: Flossenbirch) is a municipality in Neustadt an der Waldnaab in Bavaria in Germany. The state-approved leisure area is in the Bavarian Forest and borders Bohemia (the Czech Republic) in the east. During World War II, the Flossenbürg concentration camp was here. File:Flossenbuerg fortified house.jpg|Fortified house, the topmost and oldest part of Flossenbürg Castle. File:Flossenbürg02.jpg|Flossenbürg seen from north - west. In the background there is the castle. == References == Category:Neustadt an der Waldnaab (district)
title: Flossenbürg, Bavaria
